siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPL‑v3 licence.
blogPost.body: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPL‑v3 licence.
blogPost.title: Counter - Simple and free web analytics
blogPost.author: Bogdan Slomchinskiy

localize.description: 网络分析变得简单，因此对隐私友好。没有Cookies。没有记录。没有IP地址指纹。我们不收集个人数据，这允许以较少的托管成本为许多用户服务。源代码是在AGPL-v3许可下发布的。
localize.tagline: 简单而免费的网络分析

localize.description: 網絡分析變得簡單，因此對隱私友好。沒有Cookies。沒有記錄。沒有IP地址指紋。我們不收集個人數據，這允許以較少的託管成本爲許多用戶服務。源代碼是在AGPL-v3許可下發布的。
localize.tagline: 簡單而免費的網絡分析

previous.excerpt: Keep yourself accountable while learning Tailwind. Share your process on Twitter with the hashtag.

next.excerpt: Whether you're a maker, content creator, freelancer, indie hacker, influencer, or thought leader, The Creator System will help you stay organised and on track. You no longer need to rely solely on your motivation or inspiration to get things done.
next.title: The Creator System - Be organised, stay productive and produce outcomes in Notion

localize.description: 无论你是制造者、内容创作者、自由职业者、独立黑客、影响者还是思想领袖，《创客系统》都将帮助你保持组织性和正轨性。你不再需要仅仅依靠你的动机或灵感来完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有条不紊，保持生产力，并在Notion中产生成果。

localize.description: 無論你是製造者、內容創作者、自由職業者、獨立黑客、影響者還是思想領袖，《創客系統》都將幫助你保持組織性和正軌性。你不再需要僅僅依靠你的動機或靈感來完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有條不紊，保持生產力，並在Notion中產生成果。
